textobject.para: The ArgoUML Navigator Pane. A rectangular pane, with a bar at the top, in which a drop down selection indicates this is a Package-centric view. The remainder of the pane shows a hierarchical listing. The first item is untitledModel, and beneath it are two children, class diagram 1 and use case diagram 1. A scrollbar appears on the right should the view be to large for the Pane (not shown in this example).

sect2.title: Diagram Selection
sect2.para: Button 1 Click over a the name of a diagram in the main area of the Navigation Pane will select that diagram in the Editing Pane and its details in the Details Pane.

sect2.title: Artifact Selection
sect2.para: Button 1 Click over the name of any artifact other than a diagram in the main area of the Navigation Pane will cause it to be selected, and its details shown in the Details Pane. If the artifact is part of a digram currently displayed in the Editing Pane, it will be highlighted there.

note.para: If the artifact is part of a diagram other than that currently displayed in the Editing Pane, there will be no change of diagram in the Editing Pane.

sect2.title: Context Sensitive Menu
sect2.para: Button 2 Click over any selected artifact in the main area of the Navigation Pane will cause a Pop-Up menu to appear.

sect3.title: Properties Pop-Up
sect3.para: This entry on the Pop-Up menu causes the Properties Tab of the selected artifact or diagram to be displayed in the Details Pane.

sect3.title: Add to Diagram
sect3.para: This entry on the Pop-Up menu appears for any artifact that could be added to the diagram currently displayed in the Editing Pane. The item can be placed in the diagram by moving the cursor to the Editing Pane (where it will appear as a cross and clicking Button 1.

sect3.title: Delete From Model
sect3.para: This entry on the Pop-Up menu appears for any artifact that could be deleted from the model.

warning.para: This deletes the artifact from the model completely, not just from the diagram. To remove just from the diagram use the Edit Menu (see ).
